articles.title: Ayushmann Khurana reveals he auditioned for Kyuki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Ayushmann Khurrana reveals that he auditioned for a role in Ekta Kapoor's Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi, but the role eventually went to Pulkit Samrat.
articles.content: Ayushmann Khurrana has revealed that he auditioned for a role in one of Balaji Telefilm TV shows and even cleared, but did not take up the part. The role eventually went to Pulkit Samrat. (Also read:… [+1389 chars]
